00041 #define FILENAME_LENGTH                         600
00042 #define IM_FILENAME_LENGTH                      100
00043 #define BUCKET_FILENAME_LENGTH            100
00044 #define INITIAL_NUM_HANDLES               20
00045 #define NUM_FILES_TO_ADD_AT_A_TIME  20
00046 
00047 #define CHECKF(exp)  if (!(exp)) { return(FALSE); }
00048 #define CHECKV(exp)  if (!(exp)) { return; }
00049 #define CHECKN(exp)  if (!(exp)) { return(NULL); }
00050 #define CHECKBI(exp) if (!(exp)) { return(-1); }
00051 #define CHECK0(exp)  if (!(exp)) { return(0); }
00052 
00053 #define PRINT_DEBUG_INFO      FileDebugPrint();
00054 
00055 #define ExtractFileIndex( exp )     ( (HFILEINDEX)((exp)>>16) )
00056 #define ExtractDbIndex( exp )       ( (HDBINDEX)((exp)&0x0000FFFF) )

00065 // NOTE: the file format of the index file will be as follows:
00066 //
00067 //          UINT32 #    - number of entries to follow for filenames starting with '0'
00068 //          entry 1 filename
00069 //          entry 1 databasename
00070 //          entry 2 filename
00071 //          entry 2 databasename
00072 //          ...
00073 //          entry # filename
00074 //          entry # databasename
00075 //
00076 //          UINT32 #    - number of entries to follow for filenames starting with '1'
00077 //          entry 1 filename
00078 //          entry 1 databasename
00079 //          entry 2 filename
00080 //          entry 2 databasename
00081 //          ...
00082 //          entry # filename
00083 //          entry # databasename
00084 //
00085 //          ...
00086 //
00087 //          UINT32 #    - number of entries to follow for filenames starting with 'z'
00088 //          entry 1 filename
00089 //          entry 1 databasename
00090 //          entry 2 filename
00091 //          entry 2 databasename
00092 //          ...
00093 //          entry # filename
00094 //          entry # databasename
00095 //
00096 //          UINT32 #### - offset in file to entries for the letter '0'
00097 //          ...
00098 //          UINT32 #### - offset in file to entries for the letter '9'
00099 //          UINT32 #### - offset in file to entries for the letter 'a'
00100 //          ...
00101 //          UINT32 #### - offset in file to entries for the letter 'z'
00102 //
00103 //    - each set of entries for a letter will comprise a bucket
00104 
00105 typedef struct DbBucketTag
00106 {
00107       CHAR        cFirstLetter;
00108 
00109       CHAR        *pstrFilenames;
00110       CHAR        *pstrDatabasenames;
00111       UINT32      uiNumNames;
00112 } DbBucket;
00113 
00114 typedef struct DbFileTag
00115 {
00116       CHAR        strFilename[FILENAME_LENGTH];
00117       INT32       iFileSize;                    // if 0, this structure is not in use
00118       INT32       iOffsetIntoFile;
00119       INT32       iCurrentPosition;
00120 } DbFile;
00121 
00122 typedef struct DbInfoTag
00123 {
00124       CHAR        strFilename[FILENAME_LENGTH];
00125       HWFILE      hFile;                              // if 0, this structure is not in use
00126 
00127       DbFile      *pOpenFiles;
00128       UINT32      uiNumFiles;
00129 } DbInfo;
00130 
00131 typedef struct DbSystemTag
00132 {
00133       DbBucket    bucket;
00134       CHAR        strIndexFilename[FILENAME_LENGTH];
00135 
00136       DbInfo      *pDBFiles;
00137       UINT32      uiNumDBFiles;
00138 
00139       BOOLEAN     fDebug;
00140 } DbSystem;
00141

00143 typedef struct DbHeaderTag 
00144 {
00145       CHAR        strSignature[20];
00146       INT32       iNumFiles;
00147       INT32       iOffsetToIndex;
00148 } DbHeader;
00149

00151 typedef struct IndexMemberTag 
00152 {

00154       INT32       iFileSize;
00155       INT32       iOffsetIntoFile;
00156       INT32       time;
00157 } IndexMember;

00201 HDBFILE CreateDBFileHandle( HFILEINDEX high, HDBINDEX low )
00202 {
00203       return( (((LONG)high)<<16)|low );
00204 }

00206 //**************************************************************************
00207 //
00208 // DbSystemInit
00209 //
00210 //          Starts up the database system.
00211 //
00212 // Parameter List :
00213 // Return Value :
00214 // Modification history :
00215 //
00216 //          24sep96:HJH       -> creation
00217 //
00218 //**************************************************************************
00219 
00220 BOOLEAN InitializeDatabaseManager( STR strIndexFilename )
00221 {
00222       INT32       i;
00223       UINT32      uiSize;
00224 
00225       if ( !FileExistsNoDB( strIndexFilename ) )
00226       {
00227             return(FALSE);
00228       }
00229 
00230       uiSize = INITIAL_NUM_HANDLES * sizeof(DbInfo);
00231       gdb.fDebug = FALSE;
00232       gdb.pDBFiles = (DbInfo *) MemAlloc( uiSize );
00233       CHECKF( gdb.pDBFiles );
00234 
00235       gdb.uiNumDBFiles = INITIAL_NUM_HANDLES;
00236 
00237       for ( i=0 ; i<INITIAL_NUM_HANDLES ; i++ )
00238       {
00239             gdb.pDBFiles[i].hFile = 0;
00240       }
00241 
00242       strcpy( gdb.strIndexFilename, strIndexFilename );
00243 
00244   RegisterDebugTopic( TOPIC_DATABASE_MANAGER, "Database Manager");
00245 
00246       return(TRUE);
00247 }
00248 
00249 //**************************************************************************
00250 //
00251 // DbSystemShutdown
00252 //
00253 //          Shuts down the database system.
00254 //
00255 // Parameter List :
00256 // Return Value :
00257 // Modification history :
00258 //
00259 //          24sep96:HJH       -> creation
00260 //
00261 //**************************************************************************
00262 
00263 void ShutdownDatabaseManager( void )
00264 {
00265       UINT32 i;
00266 
00267       MemFree( gdb.bucket.pstrFilenames );
00268       MemFree( gdb.bucket.pstrDatabasenames );
00269 
00270       // close any unclosed files
00271       for ( i=1 ; i<gdb.uiNumDBFiles ; i++ )
00272       {
00273             DbClose((HDBINDEX)i);
00274             //if ( gdb.pDBFiles[i].hFile )
00275             //{
00276             //    FileClose(gdb.pDBFiles[i].hFile);
00277             //    gdb.pDBFiles[i].hFile = 0;
00278             //}
00279       }
00280 
00281       // release memory used
00282       MemFree( gdb.pDBFiles );
00283 
00284   UnRegisterDebugTopic( TOPIC_DATABASE_MANAGER, "Database Manager" );
00285 }

00331 
00332 //**************************************************************************
00333 //
00334 // DbOpen
00335 //
00336 //          Opens a database.
00337 //
00338 // Parameter List :
00339 //
00340 //          STR   -> filename
00341 //
00342 // Return Value :
00343 //
00344 //          HDBINDEX    -> handle of opened file
00345 //                            -> 0 if unsuccessful
00346 //
00347 // Modification history :
00348 //
00349 //          24sep96:HJH       -> creation
00350 //
00351 //**************************************************************************
00352 
00353 HDBINDEX DbOpen( STR strFilename )
00354 {
00355       HDBINDEX          hDBIndex;
00356       UINT16            i;
00357       CHAR              cShortFilename[FILENAME_LENGTH];
00358       CHAR              cShortDBName[FILENAME_LENGTH];
00359       BOOLEAN           fFound;
00360 
00361       fFound   = FALSE;
00362       hDBIndex = 0;
00363 
00364       // first, find any already open databases, and make sure that if we're trying to
00365       // open one that's already open, then we just return an index to it
00366       for ( i=1 ; i<gdb.uiNumDBFiles ; i++ )
00367       {
00368             if ( gdb.pDBFiles[i].hFile != 0 )
00369             {
00370                   GetShortFilename( cShortFilename, strFilename );
00371                   GetShortFilename( cShortDBName, gdb.pDBFiles[i].strFilename );
00372                   if ( strcmp( cShortFilename, cShortDBName ) == 0 )
00373                   {
00374                         fFound = TRUE;
00375                         hDBIndex = i;
00376                         break;
00377                   }
00378             }
00379       }
00380 
00381       // if we didn't find the database already open, then open it
00382       if ( !fFound )
00383       {
00384             for ( i=1 ; i<gdb.uiNumDBFiles ; i++ )
00385             {
00386                   if ( gdb.pDBFiles[i].hFile == 0 )
00387                   {
00388                         if ( InitDB( &gdb.pDBFiles[i], strFilename ) )
00389                               hDBIndex = i;
00390                         break;
00391                   }
00392             }
00393       }
00394 
00395       // if we didn't have enough space to open the file, allocate more and open it
00396       if ( i == gdb.uiNumDBFiles )
00397       {
00398             DbInfo *pNew;
00399 
00400             pNew = (DbInfo *) MemRealloc( gdb.pDBFiles, gdb.uiNumDBFiles + NUM_FILES_TO_ADD_AT_A_TIME );
00401             
00402             if ( !pNew )
00403             {
00404                   return(0);
00405             }
00406             gdb.pDBFiles = (DbInfo *)pNew;
00407 
00408             if ( InitDB( &gdb.pDBFiles[i], strFilename ) )
00409                   hDBIndex = i;
00410       }
00411 
00412       //ASSERT(hDBIndex);
00413       DbgMessage( TOPIC_DATABASE_MANAGER, DBG_LEVEL_2, "Opening Database File" );
00414       DbgMessage( TOPIC_DATABASE_MANAGER, DBG_LEVEL_2, strFilename );
00415 
00416       return(hDBIndex);
00417 }
00418 
00419 //**************************************************************************
00420 //
00421 // DbClose
00422 //
00423 //
00424 // Parameter List :
00425 //
00426 //          HWFILE hFile      -> handle to database file to close
00427 //
00428 // Return Value :
00429 // Modification history :
00430 //
00431 //          24sep96:HJH       -> creation
00432 //
00433 //**************************************************************************
00434 
00435 void DbClose( HDBINDEX hFile )
00436 {
00437       if ( hFile && gdb.pDBFiles[hFile].hFile )
00438       {
00439             MemFree( gdb.pDBFiles[hFile].pOpenFiles );
00440             FileClose( gdb.pDBFiles[hFile].hFile );
00441             gdb.pDBFiles[hFile].hFile = 0;
00442 
00443             DbgMessage( TOPIC_DATABASE_MANAGER, DBG_LEVEL_2, "Closing Database File" );
00444       }
00445 }
00446 
00447 //**************************************************************************
00448 //
00449 // DbFileOpen
00450 //
00451 //          Opens a file in a database.
00452 //
00453 // Parameter List :
00454 //
00455 //          STR      -> filename
00456 //          UIN32       -> access - read or write, or both
00457 //          BOOLEAN     -> delete on close
00458 //
00459 // Return Value :
00460 //
00461 //          HWFILE      -> handle of opened file
00462 //
00463 // Modification history :
00464 //
00465 //          24sep96:HJH       -> creation
00466 //
00467 //**************************************************************************
00468 
00469 HDBFILE DbFileOpen( STR strFilename )
00470 {
00471       HDBFILE           hFile;
00472       HFILEINDEX  hFileIndex;
00473       HDBINDEX          hDBIndex;
00474       UINT16            i;
00475 
00476       hDBIndex = OpenDatabaseContainingFile( strFilename );
00477       if ( !hDBIndex )
00478             return(0);
00479 
00480       for ( i=1 ; i<gdb.pDBFiles[hDBIndex].uiNumFiles ; i++ )
00481       {
00482             if ( gdb.pDBFiles[hDBIndex].pOpenFiles[i].iFileSize == 0 )
00483             {
00484                   if ( InitFile( gdb.pDBFiles[hDBIndex].hFile, &gdb.pDBFiles[hDBIndex].pOpenFiles[i], strFilename ) )
00485                         hFileIndex = i;
00486                   break;
00487             }
00488       }
00489       if ( i == gdb.pDBFiles[hDBIndex].uiNumFiles )
00490       {
00491             DbFile      *pNew; 
00492 
00493             pNew = (DbFile *) MemRealloc( gdb.pDBFiles[hDBIndex].pOpenFiles,
00494                                                  gdb.pDBFiles[hDBIndex].uiNumFiles + NUM_FILES_TO_ADD_AT_A_TIME );
00495 
00496             if ( !pNew )
00497             {
00498                   return(0);
00499             }
00500             gdb.pDBFiles[hDBIndex].pOpenFiles = (DbFile *)pNew;
00501 
00502             if ( InitFile( gdb.pDBFiles[hDBIndex].hFile, &gdb.pDBFiles[hDBIndex].pOpenFiles[i], strFilename ) )
00503                   hFileIndex = i;
00504             else
00505                   return(0);
00506       }
00507 
00508       //ASSERT(hDBIndex);
00509       //ASSERT(hFileIndex);
00510 
00511       hFile = CreateDBFileHandle( hFileIndex, hDBIndex );
00512       return(hFile);
00513 }
00514 
00515 //**************************************************************************
00516 //
00517 // DbFileClose
00518 //
00519 //
00520 // Parameter List :
00521 //
00522 //          HWFILE hFile      -> handle to database file to close
00523 //
00524 // Return Value :
00525 // Modification history :
00526 //
00527 //          24sep96:HJH       -> creation
00528 //
00529 //**************************************************************************
00530 
00531 void DbFileClose( HDBFILE hDBFile )
00532 {
00533       HFILEINDEX  hFileIndex;
00534       HDBINDEX          hDBIndex;
00535 
00536       hFileIndex = ExtractFileIndex( hDBFile );
00537       hDBIndex   = ExtractDbIndex( hDBFile );
00538 
00539       if ( hDBIndex >= gdb.uiNumDBFiles )
00540             return;
00541 
00542       if ( gdb.pDBFiles[hDBIndex].pOpenFiles )
00543       {
00544             if ( hFileIndex >= gdb.pDBFiles[hDBIndex].uiNumFiles )
00545                   return;
00546 
00547             if ( gdb.pDBFiles[hDBIndex].pOpenFiles[hFileIndex].iFileSize )
00548             {
00549                   gdb.pDBFiles[hDBIndex].pOpenFiles[hFileIndex].iFileSize = 0;
00550             }
00551       }
00552 }
00553 
00554 //**************************************************************************
00555 //
00556 // DbFileRead
00557 //
00558 //          To read a file in a database.
00559 //
00560 // Parameter List :
00561 //
00562 //          HWFILE            -> handle to file to read from
00563 //          void  *     -> source buffer
00564 //          UINT32      -> num bytes to read
00565 //          UINT32      -> num bytes read
00566 //
00567 // Return Value :
00568 //
00569 //          BOOLEAN     -> TRUE if successful
00570 //                            -> FALSE if not
00571 //
00572 // Modification history :
00573 //
00574 //          24sep96:HJH       -> creation
00575 //
00576 //**************************************************************************
00577 
00578 BOOLEAN DbFileRead(HDBFILE    hDBFile, PTR pDest, UINT32 uiBytesToRead, UINT32 *puiBytesRead)
00579 {
00580       HFILEINDEX  hFileIndex;
00581       HDBINDEX          hDBIndex;
00582       HWFILE            hFile;
00583       UINT32            uiStartPos, uiCurPos, uiBytesRead;
00584 
00585       hFileIndex = ExtractFileIndex( hDBFile );
00586       hDBIndex   = ExtractDbIndex( hDBFile );
00587 
00588       CHECKF( hDBIndex < gdb.uiNumDBFiles );
00589       CHECKF( gdb.pDBFiles[hDBIndex].pOpenFiles )
00590       CHECKF( hFileIndex < gdb.pDBFiles[hDBIndex].uiNumFiles );
00591       CHECKF( gdb.pDBFiles[hDBIndex].pOpenFiles[hFileIndex].iFileSize );
00592 
00593       hFile             = gdb.pDBFiles[hDBIndex].hFile;
00594       uiStartPos  = gdb.pDBFiles[hDBIndex].pOpenFiles[hFileIndex].iOffsetIntoFile;
00595       uiCurPos          = gdb.pDBFiles[hDBIndex].pOpenFiles[hFileIndex].iCurrentPosition;
00596 
00597       CHECKF( hFile );
00598 
00599       FileSeek( hFile, uiStartPos + uiCurPos, FILE_SEEK_FROM_START );
00600       FileRead( hFile, pDest, uiBytesToRead, &uiBytesRead );
00601 
00602       if ( puiBytesRead )
00603             *puiBytesRead = uiBytesRead;
00604 
00605       gdb.pDBFiles[hDBIndex].pOpenFiles[hFileIndex].iCurrentPosition += uiBytesToRead;
00606 
00607       return(TRUE);
00608 }
00609 
00610 //**************************************************************************
00611 //
00612 // DbFileLoad
00613 //
00614 //          To open, read, and close a file.
00615 //
00616 // Parameter List :
00617 //
00618 //
00619 // Return Value :
00620 //
00621 //          BOOLEAN     -> TRUE if successful
00622 //                            -> FALSE if not
00623 //
00624 // Modification history :
00625 //
00626 //          24sep96:HJH       -> creation
00627 //
00628 //**************************************************************************
00629 
00630 BOOLEAN DbFileLoad(STR filename, PTR pDest, UINT32 uiBytesToRead, UINT32 *puiBytesRead)
00631 {
00632       HDBFILE     hDBFile;
00633       UINT32      uiBytesRead;
00634 
00635       hDBFile = DbFileOpen( filename );
00636       CHECKF( hDBFile );
00637 
00638       DbFileRead( hDBFile, pDest, uiBytesToRead, &uiBytesRead );
00639       DbFileClose( hDBFile );
00640 
00641       if ( puiBytesRead )
00642             *puiBytesRead = uiBytesRead;
00643 
00644       return(TRUE);
00645 }
00646 
00647 //**************************************************************************
00648 //
00649 // DbFileSeek
00650 //
00651 //          To seek to a position in a file in a database.
00652 //
00653 // Parameter List :
00654 //
00655 //          HWFILE      -> handle to file to seek in
00656 //          UINT32      -> distance to seek
00657 //          UINT8       -> how to seek
00658 //
00659 // Return Value :
00660 //
00661 //          BOOLEAN     -> TRUE if successful
00662 //                            -> FALSE if not
00663 //
00664 // Modification history :
00665 //
00666 //          24sep96:HJH       -> creation
00667 //
00668 //**************************************************************************
00669 
00670 BOOLEAN DbFileSeek( HDBFILE hDBFile, UINT32 uiDistance, UINT8 uiHow )
00671 {
00672       HFILEINDEX  hFileIndex;
00673       HDBINDEX          hDBIndex;
00674       UINT32            uiStartPos, uiCurPos, uiSize;
00675 
00676       hFileIndex = ExtractFileIndex( hDBFile );
00677       hDBIndex   = ExtractDbIndex( hDBFile );
00678 
00679       CHECKF( hDBIndex < gdb.uiNumDBFiles );
00680       CHECKF( gdb.pDBFiles[hDBIndex].pOpenFiles )
00681       CHECKF( hFileIndex < gdb.pDBFiles[hDBIndex].uiNumFiles );
00682       CHECKF( gdb.pDBFiles[hDBIndex].pOpenFiles[hFileIndex].iFileSize );
00683 
00684       uiStartPos  = gdb.pDBFiles[hDBIndex].pOpenFiles[hFileIndex].iOffsetIntoFile;
00685       uiCurPos          = gdb.pDBFiles[hDBIndex].pOpenFiles[hFileIndex].iCurrentPosition;
00686       uiSize            = gdb.pDBFiles[hDBIndex].pOpenFiles[hFileIndex].iFileSize;
00687 
00688       if ( uiHow == FILE_SEEK_FROM_START )
00689             uiCurPos = uiDistance;
00690       else if ( uiHow == FILE_SEEK_FROM_END )
00691             uiCurPos = uiSize - uiDistance;
00692       else if ( uiHow == FILE_SEEK_FROM_CURRENT )
00693             uiCurPos += uiDistance;
00694       else
00695             return(FALSE);
00696 
00697       return(TRUE);
00698 }
00699 
00700 //**************************************************************************
00701 //
00702 // DbFileGetSize
00703 //
00704 //          To get the current position in a file.
00705 //
00706 // Parameter List :
00707 //
00708 //          HWFILE      -> handle to file
00709 //
00710 // Return Value :
00711 //
00712 //          INT32       -> current offset in file if successful
00713 //                            -> -1 if not
00714 //
00715 // Modification history :
00716 //
00717 //          24sep96:HJH       -> creation
00718 //
00719 //**************************************************************************
00720 
00721 UINT32 DbFileGetPos( HDBFILE hDBFile )
00722 {
00723       HFILEINDEX  hFileIndex;
00724       HDBINDEX          hDBIndex;
00725 
00726       hFileIndex = ExtractFileIndex( hDBFile );
00727       hDBIndex   = ExtractDbIndex( hDBFile );
00728 
00729       CHECK0( hDBIndex < gdb.uiNumDBFiles );
00730       CHECK0( gdb.pDBFiles[hDBIndex].pOpenFiles )
00731       CHECK0( hFileIndex < gdb.pDBFiles[hDBIndex].uiNumFiles );
00732       CHECK0( gdb.pDBFiles[hDBIndex].pOpenFiles[hFileIndex].iFileSize );
00733 
00734       return(gdb.pDBFiles[hDBIndex].pOpenFiles[hFileIndex].iCurrentPosition);
00735 }
00736 
00737 //**************************************************************************
00738 //
00739 // DbFileGetSize
00740 //
00741 //          To get the current file size.
00742 //
00743 // Parameter List :
00744 //
00745 //          HWFILE      -> handle to file
00746 //
00747 // Return Value :
00748 //
00749 //          INT32       -> file size in file if successful
00750 //                            -> 0 if not
00751 //
00752 // Modification history :
00753 //
00754 //          24sep96:HJH       -> creation
00755 //
00756 //**************************************************************************
00757 
00758 UINT32 DbFileGetSize( HDBFILE hDBFile )
00759 {
00760       HFILEINDEX  hFileIndex;
00761       HDBINDEX          hDBIndex;
00762 
00763       hFileIndex = ExtractFileIndex( hDBFile );
00764       hDBIndex   = ExtractDbIndex( hDBFile );
00765 
00766       CHECK0( hDBIndex < gdb.uiNumDBFiles );
00767       CHECK0( gdb.pDBFiles[hDBIndex].pOpenFiles )
00768       CHECK0( hFileIndex < gdb.pDBFiles[hDBIndex].uiNumFiles );
00769       CHECK0( gdb.pDBFiles[hDBIndex].pOpenFiles[hFileIndex].iFileSize );
00770 
00771       return(gdb.pDBFiles[hDBIndex].pOpenFiles[hFileIndex].iFileSize);
00772 }
00773

00792 //**************************************************************************
00793 //
00794 // InitDB
00795 //
00796 //          To initialize a database info structure.
00797 //
00798 // Parameter List :
00799 // Return Value :
00800 // Modification history :
00801 //
00802 //          15oct96:HJH       -> creation
00803 //
00804 //**************************************************************************
00805 
00806 BOOLEAN InitDB( DbInfo *pDBInfo, STR strFilename )
00807 {
00808       HWFILE            hFile;
00809       INT32             i;
00810 
00811       CHECKF(pDBInfo);
00812 
00813       hFile = FileOpen( strFilename, FILE_ACCESS_READ, FALSE );
00814       CHECKF( hFile );
00815 
00816       strcpy( pDBInfo->strFilename, strFilename );
00817       pDBInfo->hFile = hFile;
00818       pDBInfo->pOpenFiles = (DbFile *) MemAlloc(INITIAL_NUM_HANDLES * sizeof(DbFile));
00819 
00820       if ( !pDBInfo->pOpenFiles )
00821       {
00822             FileClose( hFile );
00823             return(FALSE);
00824       }
00825 
00826       for ( i=0 ; i<INITIAL_NUM_HANDLES ; i++ )
00827       {
00828             pDBInfo->pOpenFiles[i].iFileSize = 0;
00829       }
00830       pDBInfo->uiNumFiles = INITIAL_NUM_HANDLES;
00831 
00832       return(TRUE);
00833 }
00834 
00835 //**************************************************************************
00836 //
00837 // OpenDatabaseContainingFile
00838 //
00839 //          To open, or find the already opened database, containing the given file.
00840 //
00841 // Parameter List :
00842 // Return Value :
00843 // Modification history :
00844 //
00845 //          15oct96:HJH       -> creation
00846 //
00847 //**************************************************************************
00848 
00849 HDBINDEX OpenDatabaseContainingFile( STR strFilename )
00850 {
00851       CHAR        cFirst, cFilename[FILENAME_LENGTH], cCheckname[FILENAME_LENGTH];
00852       UINT32      i;
00853       HDBINDEX    hIndex;
00854 
00855       hIndex = 0;
00856       GetShortFilename( cFilename, strFilename );
00857 
00858       cFirst = cFilename[0];
00859 
00860       if ( cFirst != gdb.bucket.cFirstLetter )
00861             LoadBucket( cFirst );
00862 
00863       for ( i=0 ; i<gdb.bucket.uiNumNames ; i++ )
00864       {
00865             GetShortFilename( cCheckname, &(gdb.bucket.pstrFilenames[i*BUCKET_FILENAME_LENGTH]) );
00866 
00867             if ( strcmp( cCheckname, cFilename ) == 0 )
00868             {
00869                   break;
00870             }
00871       }
00872 
00873       if ( i < gdb.bucket.uiNumNames )
00874       {
00875             hIndex = DbOpen( &gdb.bucket.pstrDatabasenames[i*BUCKET_FILENAME_LENGTH] );
00876       }
00877 
00878       return( hIndex );
00879 }
00880 
00881 //**************************************************************************
00882 //
00883 // InitFile
00884 //
00885 //          To initialize a file info structure.
00886 //
00887 // Parameter List :
00888 // Return Value :
00889 // Modification history :
00890 //
00891 //          15oct96:HJH       -> creation
00892 //
00893 //**************************************************************************
00894 
00895 BOOLEAN InitFile( HWFILE hDBFile, DbFile *pFileInfo, STR strFilename )
00896 {
00897       DbHeader    header;
00898       IndexMember im;
00899       UINT32      uiBytesRead;
00900       INT32       i;
00901       CHAR        cFilename[FILENAME_LENGTH], cShortFilename[FILENAME_LENGTH];
00902 
00903       CHECKF( pFileInfo );
00904       CHECKF( strFilename );
00905       CHECKF( hDBFile );
00906 
00907       FileSeek( hDBFile, 0, FILE_SEEK_FROM_START );
00908       FileRead( hDBFile, &header, sizeof(DbHeader), &uiBytesRead );
00909       CHECKF( uiBytesRead == sizeof(DbHeader) );
00910       FileSeek( hDBFile, header.iOffsetToIndex, FILE_SEEK_FROM_START );
00911 
00912       GetShortFilename( cShortFilename, strFilename );
00913       for ( i=0 ; i<header.iNumFiles ; i++ )
00914       {
00915             FileRead( hDBFile, &im, sizeof(IndexMember), &uiBytesRead );
00916             CHECKF( uiBytesRead == sizeof(IndexMember) );
00917             GetShortFilename( cFilename, im.strFilename );
00918             if ( strcmp( cFilename, cShortFilename ) == 0 )
00919             {
00920                   strcpy( pFileInfo->strFilename, strFilename );
00921                   pFileInfo->iFileSize = im.iFileSize;
00922                   pFileInfo->iOffsetIntoFile = im.iOffsetIntoFile;
00923                   pFileInfo->iCurrentPosition = 0;
00924                   return(TRUE);
00925             }
00926       }
00927 
00928       return(FALSE);
00929 }
00930 
00931 //**************************************************************************
00932 //
00933 // LoadBucket
00934 //
00935 //          To load a bucketfull of file-database name pairs.
00936 //
00937 // Parameter List :
00938 // Return Value :
00939 // Modification history :
00940 //
00941 //          15oct96:HJH       -> creation
00942 //
00943 //**************************************************************************
00944 
00945 BOOLEAN LoadBucket( CHAR cFirstLetter )
00946 {
00947       HWFILE      hFile;
00948       UINT32      i, uiPosition, uiBytesRead, uiNumEntries, uiSize;
00949       CHAR        cFilename[FILENAME_LENGTH], cDatabasename[FILENAME_LENGTH];
00950 
00951       uiNumEntries = 0;
00952 
00953       MemFree( gdb.bucket.pstrFilenames );
00954       MemFree( gdb.bucket.pstrDatabasenames );
00955 
00956       hFile = FileOpen( gdb.strIndexFilename, FILE_ACCESS_READ, FALSE );
00957       CHECKF(hFile);
00958       uiSize = FileGetSize( hFile );
00959 
00960       if ( cFirstLetter >= 'a' && cFirstLetter <= 'z' )
00961             uiPosition = 'z' - cFirstLetter + 1;
00962       else
00963             uiPosition = 26 + ('9' - cFirstLetter + 1);
00964 
00965       FileSeek( hFile, sizeof(UINT32)*uiPosition, FILE_SEEK_FROM_END );
00966       FileRead( hFile, &uiPosition, sizeof(UINT32), &uiBytesRead );
00967       if ( uiPosition > uiSize )
00968       {
00969             // error
00970             return(FALSE);
00971       }
00972 
00973       FileSeek( hFile, uiPosition, FILE_SEEK_FROM_START );
00974       FileRead( hFile, &uiNumEntries, sizeof(UINT32), &uiBytesRead );
00975 
00976       CHECKF(uiNumEntries);
00977 
00978       gdb.bucket.pstrFilenames = (CHAR *)MemAlloc( uiNumEntries * FILENAME_LENGTH);
00979       CHECKF(gdb.bucket.pstrFilenames);
00980 
00981       gdb.bucket.pstrDatabasenames = (CHAR *)MemAlloc( uiNumEntries * FILENAME_LENGTH);
00982       if ( !gdb.bucket.pstrDatabasenames )
00983       {
00984             MemFree(gdb.bucket.pstrFilenames);
00985             return(FALSE);
00986       }
00987 
00988 
00989       for ( i=0 ; i<uiNumEntries ; i++ )
00990       {
00991             FileRead( hFile, cFilename, BUCKET_FILENAME_LENGTH, &uiBytesRead );
00992             FileRead( hFile, cDatabasename, BUCKET_FILENAME_LENGTH, &uiBytesRead );
00993 
00994             strcpy( &gdb.bucket.pstrFilenames[i*BUCKET_FILENAME_LENGTH], cFilename );
00995             strcpy( &gdb.bucket.pstrDatabasenames[i*BUCKET_FILENAME_LENGTH], cDatabasename );
00996       }
00997 
00998       FileClose( hFile );
00999 
01000       gdb.bucket.uiNumNames = uiNumEntries;
01001       gdb.bucket.cFirstLetter = cFirstLetter;
01002 
01003       DbgMessage( TOPIC_DATABASE_MANAGER, DBG_LEVEL_2, "Loading Different Bucket" );
01004 
01005       return(TRUE);
01006 }
01007 
01008 //**************************************************************************
01009 //
01010 // GetShortFilename
01011 //
01012 //          To chop up a path, and return just the short filename.
01013 //
01014 // Parameter List :
01015 // Return Value :
01016 // Modification history :
01017 //
01018 //          15oct96:HJH       -> creation
01019 //
01020 //**************************************************************************
01021 
01022 BOOLEAN GetShortFilename( STR strFilename, STR strPathname )
01023 {
01024       CHAR *pcLast;
01025 
01026       pcLast = strrchr( strPathname, '\\' );
01027 
01028       if ( pcLast )
01029       {
01030             pcLast = pcLast + 1;
01031             strcpy( strFilename, pcLast );
01032       }
01033       else
01034             strcpy( strFilename, strPathname );
01035 
01036       return(TRUE);
01037 }
